NegativeAdjectives.definition: Something that is or reminiscent of radioactive materials.
Something that is characteristic of the perma-winter outside.
Vulgarity against anyone sympathetic to increasing radiation exposure.

PositiveAdjectives.definition: Well protected against radiation, cold, or generally well protected.
Safe or otherwise protected against hostile entities.

NegativeVerbs.definition: To adapt to nuclear apocalypse rather than trying to solve the problem.
To look for and hoarde radioactive substances or materials.
To purposefully expose something/someone to radiation.

PositiveVerbs.definition: The act of protecting against radiation or cold climates.
The act of dispersing anti-radiation substances.
The act of investigating and learning new things.

NegativeObjectNouns.definition: Nuclear powerplant water by-product, heavily radioactive.
Slang for ingots of radioactive metals.
White ash, irritant and toxic to animal life.

NegativePersonNouns.definition: Worshipper of nuclear or atomic materials, fans of radiation.
Scientists that believe the next step of evolution requries radiation.
Person who submerges themselves in nuclear by-products.

PositiveObjectNouns.definition: An injectable that helps combat radiation poisoning.
Personal protection equipment against radioactive gasses.
Viscous substance that helps counteract radioactivity.

PositivePersonNouns.definition: Clad in quarantine suits, ready to help those with radiation poisoning.
Person who recycles or properly dispose of dangerous substances.
Someone who sprays radiation countermeasure substances.

PlotKeywords.name: The Church of Our Blessed Nuclear Waste
